startDate.description: The start date of the codebase analysis.

endDate.description: The end date of the codebase analysis. If omitted current date will be used.

incrementBy.description: Resolution of the analysis. If you choose `1`, it will check out 1 commit per day. `14` would check the state of the codebase every 2 weeks.

name.description: The name of the repository. This label is used to identify the project in searches.

branch.description: The branch of the repository to be analyzed.

repo.description: The repository to be searched (use repo.name).

name.description: The name of the search operation.

glob.description: The glob pattern to match files.

searchString.description: The string to search within files. If omitted files will be counted. If present _lines_ will be counted

wholeWord.description: Whether to match whole words only.

regex.description: Whether the search pattern is a regular expression.

name.description: The name of the chart (this will be rendered in the chart).

items.description: List of search operation names to include in the chart. Use `["*"]` to match all searches.
List of charts to be generated from the searches.
